Description: Welcome to Harborwalk Residences. Built in 2021, this stunning 2 bedroom open concept condominium in East Boston has a kitchen equipped with all stainless steel appliances and quartz countertops, oak wood floors, in-unit laundry, 1 full and 1 half bathroom, and plenty of natural light with views of the East Boston Waterfront through oversized windows. Come enjoy a wide variety of restaurants, shops, activities, and easy access to public transportation all while being tucked away in a waterfront neighborhood.
